music and media mogul is thinking about quitting the show in order to focus on its American version, and he sees the ex-glamour model as his perfect replacement. The Daily Star quotes him as saying: Do I want Katie Price as a judge on "The X Factor' panel? Yeah, that could work. Why not? I like her as a person. In fact I'd even go as far as to say she"s my woman of the decade. Indeed, it is not only Simon Cowell who believes this to be the case.His ex-girlfriend, Sinnita, who has helped out in a mentor role on the show in the past, is in agreement.
